start.users: CREATE TABLE if not exists `users` (`user_id` int(11) primary key auto_increment,`username` varchar(64) not null, `email` varchar(64) not null,`password` varchar(128) not null,`jwt_access` varchar(300), `jwt_refresh` varchar(300),`perms` int references perms(perms_id), `ip` varchar(20))
start.todo: CREATE TABLE if not exists `todo` (`todo_id` int(11) primary key auto_increment, `user` int(11) references users(user_id), `title` varchar(128) not null, `description` varchar(500) not null)
start.perms: CREATE TABLE if not exists `perms` (`perms_id` int(11) primary key auto_increment, `permission` varchar(64) not null, `group` varchar(64) not null)
